title: One Last Chance to Build Back Better
sub_head: The expanded child tax credit is about to expire; extending it should be the priority.
body:
West Virginia Sen. Joe Manchin’s firm, public “No” on Sunday killed the current version of the Build Back Better bill. Absent a road-to-Damascus conversion by Mr. Manchin, the vote on the bill Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer has announced for early January will be the proposal’s funeral.
The overall effort is not beyond resurrection, however. To revive it, the administration and congressional Democrats must make hard choices they have ducked so far.
